channel.title: Can someone help me with my Ipod problem?
channel.description:
Ok heres what going on, i recently started useing my Ipod again an it started skipping songs so im Listening to song 26 and once its done it goes to 27 then 28 then 29 then 30 then 31 and so i just select another song and it skips again!
So I've tried holding the center button and the menu button to reset it, nothing happened i also checked if my shuffle setting were on or off, shuffle was off.
Now i need to know am i screwed? or is it possible to fix it

item.title: Can someone help me with my Ipod problem?
item.dc:creator: @JukuG JukuG
item.description:
@JukuG wrote:

I screwed up my iPod before by pressing all the buttons at the same time.

the fu superior:

dumbass, to keep u busy and stop spaming these forms ill show u this awesome website over here

omfg that is grose.

Read full topic
item.source: Can someone help me with my Ipod problem?

item.title: Can someone help me with my Ipod problem?
item.dc:creator: @googlethis googlethis
item.description:
@googlethis wrote:

Mr.Chris:

Corrupt files. It happened to me, and I just had to check all the files.

Not necessarily. I had a iPod a while back, it skipped songs randomly. Bought a nano and they didn’t skip at all.

Read full topic

@rabcarl wrote:

[quote=“PaulT, post:10, topic:21739”]Step 1: Throw away the Ipod.

Step 2:Get a walkman and record tapes from the radio.[/quote]
XD what if he actually said “ok” and then threw away his $250 iPod…

p.s. im kind of a cheech sometimes
